headline: How the Narrative Around Axon Enterprise Is Evolving Amid Mixed Orders and Long Term Growth Hopes
summary: Axon Enterprise’s latest narrative update keeps its fair value estimate steady at about $822.50 per share, even as analysts slightly lift their implied required return on the stock. With revenue growth expectations still running near 25.1% annually, the debate now centers on how execution risks stack up against a still optimistic long term story and modestly higher price targets. Read on to see how you can track these shifting assumptions and stay on top of Axon’s evolving narrative. Stay...
